<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_570213_bacheca_annuncio</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Data</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// valore della data corrente 
		var today = new GlideDateTime();
	//valore in formato data/time preso dal campo 
	var DataDiUscita = new GlideDateTime(current.dataevento);
	if(DataDiUscita.before(today) || today.addDaysLocalTime(30)){
		gs.addErrorMessage('Errore: non può essere inserito un annuncio antecedente a quella di oggi');
		//current.setAbortAction(true);
	

		
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-30 10:11:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0dcfe3492f0aa01016cffd1df699b64c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Bacheca" source="x_570213_bacheca">53aebe342f0e601016cffd1df699b669</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Bacheca">53aebe342f0e601016cffd1df699b669</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0dcfe3492f0aa01016cffd1df699b64c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-30 12:38:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0dcfe3492f0aa01016cffd1df699b64c"/></record_update>
